jobs.title: Senior React Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Front-End Developer to join our team in Colombo, Sri Lanka. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience working with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React or Angular.

company.name: Tech Innovators
company.description: Tech Innovators is a leading technology company specializing in web development and digital solutions. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products and services to our clients while fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.

jobs.title: Front-End Engineer (React & Redux)
jobs.description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in scenic Kandy, Sri Lanka. We are looking for a motivated individual with a passion for crafting beautiful and responsive web applications. Experience with UI/UX design principles and a strong attention to detail are highly desirable.

company.name: Veneer Creations
company.description: Veneer Creations is a creative agency specializing in digital design and development. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of creativity and innovation to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

jobs.title: Internship
jobs.description: Are you passionate about front-end development? Join our team in vibrant Galle, Sri Lanka, and work on exciting projects that make a difference. We offer competitive compensation and a collaborative work environment where your ideas are valued.

company.name: Cloud Solutions
company.description: Cloud Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in digital solutions for businesses of all sizes. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, we are committed to delivering cutting-edge products and services.

jobs.title: Front-End Developer
jobs.description: Join our team as a Part-Time Front-End Developer in Jaffna, Sri Lanka. We are looking for a self-motivated individual with a passion for creating engaging user experiences. This position offers flexible hours and the opportunity to work remotely.

company.name: Alpha Webworks
company.description: Alpha Webworks is a dynamic startup specializing in digital marketing and web development. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where creativity and innovation thrive.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Exciting opportunity for a Full-Time Front-End Developer in bustling Negombo, Sri Lanka. We are seeking a talented individual with a passion for building elegant and scalable web applications. Join our team and make an impact!

company.name: TechWave Solutions
company.description: TechWave Solutions is a rapidly growing technology company specializing in e-commerce solutions. We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment where employees are encouraged to think creatively and innovate.

jobs.title: React Native Developer
jobs.description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in beautiful Matara, Sri Lanka. We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic individual to help us create innovative web solutions. Competitive salary and great benefits package available.

company.name: Southern Tech
